abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of Lamborghini Aventador LP 700-4 Roadster.
lead_paragraph: A man who has mostly owned old Jeeps and Volvos gets to spend time with the 2013 Lamborghini Aventador LP 700-4 Roadster. The experience, he writes, is an itch he can get used to scratching.

headline.main: What I Discovered on My Flash Drive
headline.print_headline: What I Discovered on My Flash Drive
headline.content_kicker: Behind the Wheel Lamborghini Aventador LP 700-4 Roadster
